trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Jersey City
There were no other sightings in Jersey City on or around November 9th 1965
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on the stoop of my house viewing the unusual sight of New York City in blackness ( it was the night of the North East and NYC blackout of 1965. The night was clear and I had pretty much an unobstructed view of NYC as it is in direct line of sight of my house. Everything was dark except for a moving point of light moving slowely in the sky, over Manhatten from north to south. At first I thought it to be an airplane but when it reached a position over where the trade center would later be built it came to a dead stop and remained there for just under a minute as I recall. Then it shot straight up into the clear dark sky at an astonishing rate of speed. I'll never forget that night. The reason I am reporting this now is because of a recent UFO video that has been on the news. It is the one that shows a glowing object over the Dome of the Rock. That video shows EXACTLY what I witnessed in 1965 over New York City when I was 17 years old. It behaved in EXACTLY the same way.
Summary: Object moved in straight line from north to south over Manhatten. Stopped over lower NYC then shot straight up at extreme velocity.
